titles: K. Henry IV with the humours of Sir John Falstaff : a tragi-comedy as it is acted at the theatre in Little-Lincolns-Inn-Fields by His Majesty's servants : revived with alterations / written originally by Mr. Shakespear.
author: Betterton, Thomas, 1635?-1710.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. King Henry IV. Part 1.
publisher: Printed for R.W. and sold by John Deeve ...,
notes: The first part only, adapted by Thomas Betterton. Cf. Bartlett.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
keywords: Henry --  IV, --  King of England, 1367-1413 --  Drama.
